name: Slow Cooker Home-Style Chicken Stew

ingredients.name: boneless, skinless chicken breasts or thighs

totalTime: 3 hrs & 20 min (3 hrs slow cook time)
preparation:
1. In a large pan, heat oil over medium-high heat. Meanwhile, cut chicken into bite-sized pieces. Add to pan. Stir-fry until golden on some sides. Transfer to a 6-quart slow cooker.  
  2. Dice celery and carrots. You should have about 1 cup each. Cube potatoes. You should have about 2 cups. Add celery, carrots, potatoes, water, and seasoning to slow cooker. 
  3. Cover and cook on high 3 hours. Veggies should be tender, and chicken cooked through. 
  4. Stir in frozen peas. Cover to let peas warm through, about 1 min.
